attributes.action: Do not fund the Bexhill to Hastings Link Road
attributes.additional_details: 'We petition the Government not to fund the Bexhill-Hastings Link Road as it will destroy the tranquillity and heritage of  Combe Haven and smaller valleys, the probable site of the Battle of Hastings, and will not bring the claimed economic benefits. We wish instead to see Government investing in sustainable transport measures for Bexhill, Hastings and the surrounding area.'
